product_overview: Biomerkin is a cloud-native, multi-agent bioinformatics platform that leverages specialized AI and computational biology agents to analyze genomic and proteomic data, research scientific literature, identify drug candidates, and generate comprehensive medical reports. It is built on a scalable AWS infrastructure with serverless components, ensuring robust, efficient, and automated bioinformatics workflows.
core_goals: Provide accurate and comprehensive DNA sequence analysis to identify genes and mutations.
Predict and analyze protein structures and their functional annotations effectively.
Integrate AI-driven literature research and summarization to support scientific discovery.
Facilitate drug discovery by retrieving drug candidates and clinical trial information.
Generate detailed medical reports leveraging AI reasoning for clinical decision support.
Offer a scalable, secure, and reliable cloud-native platform using AWS technologies.
Ensure seamless orchestration of specialized agents to automate complex bioinformatics workflows.
Deliver interactive data visualization and an intuitive modern frontend for user engagement.
key_features: GenomicsAgent for DNA sequence analysis using Biopython modules.
ProteomicsAgent integrating Protein Data Bank (PDB) API for 3D protein structure visualization and functional analysis.
LiteratureAgent utilizing Amazon Bedrock for AI-powered literature research and summarization.
DrugAgent that retrieves drug candidates and clinical trials information for drug discovery.
DecisionAgent to generate comprehensive and actionable medical reports with AI reasoning capabilities.
WorkflowOrchestrator managing the execution and state of multi-agent workflows across serverless AWS Lambda functions.
React-based modern frontend with routing, animations, and interactive data visualizations using Recharts and Three.js.
Robust AWS infrastructure automation with AWS CDK, enabling deployment and monitoring.
Caching with Redis for performance optimization and cost monitoring services.
Comprehensive error handling and recovery system ensuring high availability.
CLI interface for command-line bioinformatics analysis execution.
Advanced multi-agent communication supported by AWS Strands Agents integration.
user_flow_summary: User accesses the React web interface to upload bioinformatics data or initiate analysis workflows.
The frontend communicates with backend API services to submit analysis requests.

WorkflowOrchestrator coordinates the execution of specialized agents: GenomicsAgent analyzes gene sequences; ProteomicsAgent assesses protein structures; LiteratureAgent performs literature reviews; DrugAgent fetches drug-related data; DecisionAgent synthesizes a medical report.
Each agent processes data using domain-specific methods and external APIs, storing intermediate results in S3 and state in DynamoDB.
The orchestrator manages workflow states and triggers successive agents until workflow completion.
Users view results via interactive visualization components including charts and 3D protein viewers on the frontend.
Cost monitoring and optimization services track AWS resource utilization and provide insights.
Users or developers can also run analyses via a CLI interface for automation or batch processing.
Comprehensive error handling and recovery ensure reliable workflows even in case of partial failures.
validation_criteria: GenomicsAgent correctly identifies known gene sequences and mutations on test datasets with high accuracy.
ProteomicsAgent accurately retrieves and renders protein structures from PDB data.
LiteratureAgent generates meaningful and concise summaries from scientific articles using Amazon Bedrock.
DrugAgent identifies relevant drug candidates and clinical trial information matching query parameters.
DecisionAgent outputs coherent, medically relevant reports validated by domain experts.
WorkflowOrchestrator reliably manages agent execution and maintains consistent workflow state in DynamoDB.
Frontend UI passes usability testing with fast load times and clear data visualizations.
System demonstrates scalability and fault tolerance under simulated high load conditions.
AWS infrastructure deployments succeed using CDK without errors, integrating monitoring and cost optimization.
Caching system reduces redundant computations and improves response times effectively.
Error handling recovers gracefully from failures without data loss or workflow inconsistencies.
CLI interface runs complete workflows and produces results identical to the frontend-initiated runs.
End-to-end testing covers all integrated components with high code coverage.
